sentence.Network_en: I gradually got rather disillusioned with the whole setup of the university.
sentence.Network_cn: 渐渐地，我对大学的整个体制感到相当失望。

sentence.Network_en: The tidal stream or current gradually decreases in the shallows.
sentence.Network_cn: 浅滩上的潮水逐渐退去。

sentence.Network_en: The West has gradually relaxed its hostile attitude to this influential state.
sentence.Network_cn: 西方对这个颇具影响力的国家的敌视态度已逐渐缓和。

entry.def: If something changes or is done gradually, it changes or is done in small stages over a long period of time, rather than suddenly.

example.ex: Electricity lines to 30,000 homes were gradually being restored yesterday...
example.tran: 昨天，3万户家庭逐渐恢复了供电。

sentences.sentence: "the snake moved gradually toward its victim"

auth_sentence.content: They could gradually move others to a new system.
auth_sentence.res_content: They could gradually move others to a new system.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They could gradually move others to a new system.

auth_sentence.content: Gradually whisk in the sugar until stiff and glossy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Gradually whisk in the sugar until stiff and glossy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Gradually whisk in the sugar until stiff and glossy.

auth_sentence.content: Initially sceptical, Bartos gradually warmed to the concept.
auth_sentence.res_content: Initially sceptical, Bartos gradually warmed to the concept.

Sentence.sentence: It has gradually given way to service industry.
It will gradually weaken the eyes of adults.

He has done it by exploring, by experimenting, by developing his own model of the grammar of language, by trying it out and seeing whether it works, by gradually changing it and refining it until it does work.
Traditional vocational training in public high schools is gradually declining, stranding thousands of young people who seek training for a craft without going to college.

sentences.en: After months of work,the new book is gradually taking shape.
sentences.cn: 经过几个月的努力,这本新书渐渐成型了。

sentences.en: After an initial burst of enthusiasm for jogging, I gradually lost interest.
sentences.cn: 一时的热情过去之后，我对慢跑逐渐失去了兴趣。

sentences.en: After months of discussion, a peace agreement is gradually taking shape.
sentences.cn: 经过几个月的商讨,和平协议渐渐有了眉目。
